Action.Name: DlgProgressBar.GetPos
Action.Description: Returns the current position of the progress meter within the progress bar control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the progress bar control whose position you want.

Action.Name: DlgProgressBar.GetProperties
Action.Description: Returns a table containing the properties of a progress bar control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the progress bar whose properties you want.

Action.Name: DlgProgressBar.GetRange
Action.Description: Returns a table containing the range of the progress bar control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the progress bar whose range you want.

Action.Name: DlgProgressBar.SetPos
Action.Description: Sets the position of the progress meter within the progress bar control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the progress bar control whose position you want to set.

Arg.Name: Pos
Arg.Description: The position you want to set the progress meter to. This position should be a value within the range defined in DlgProgressBar.SetRange.

Action.Name: DlgProgressBar.SetProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of a progress bar control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the progress bar control whose properties you wan to set.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the progress bar control properties, indexed by "Enabled", "Text" and "Visible".

Action.Name: DlgProgressBar.SetRange
Action.Description: Sets the range of a progress bar control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the progress bar control whose range you want to set.

Arg.Name: Begin
Arg.Description: The beginning value of the range.

Arg.Name: End
Arg.Description: The ending value of the range.

Action.Name: DlgProgressBar.SetStep
Action.Description: Sets the step value of the progress bar control that will be used whenever DlgProgressBar.Step is called.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the progress bar control whose step value you want to set.

Arg.Name: Step
Arg.Description: The numeric step value you want to use.

Action.Name: DlgProgressBar.Step
Action.Description: Increments the current progress by the step amount specified in the DlgProgressBar.SetStep action.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the progress bar control whose progress you want to increment.
